mapper.select: select (select CMMN_CODE_DC from tb_cmmn_code where CMMN_CODE_TY = 'X0' and DELETE_YN = 'N' and CMMN_CODE = 'X001') as uri , (select CMMN_CODE_DC from tb_cmmn_code where CMMN_CODE_TY = 'X0' and DELETE_YN = 'N' and CMMN_CODE = 'X002') as apiKey , (select CMMN_CODE_DC from tb_cmmn_code where CMMN_CODE_TY = 'X0' and DELETE_YN = 'N' and CMMN_CODE = 'X003') as userId , (select CMMN_CODE_DC from tb_cmmn_code where CMMN_CODE_TY = 'X0' and DELETE_YN = 'N' and CMMN_CODE = 'X004') as profileKey , (select CMMN_CODE_DC from tb_cmmn_code where CMMN_CODE_TY = 'X0' and DELETE_YN = 'N' and CMMN_CODE = 'X005') as templateCode
